review_blob: This golden beauty is nearly flawless. At 100 IBUs, one would expect to be knocked to their knees with bitterness, however Moralit is so wonderfully and fearfully balanced that all aspects of this beer shine through equally. The aromas are of sweet citrus and resin while the appearance is a vibrant, golden orange. The taste is bittersweet and the palate is more than pleasant. This is a spectacular beer.
beer_name: Dieu du Ciel / The Alchemist Moralit

review_blob: Strong citrus and floral aromas galore! Pours a slightly hazy amber-orange colour with a finger of off-white head. Mildly sweet with some lingering bitterness, but not over-powering. This brew truly is a delight.

At 6%, this is almost a sessionable White IPA. The Citra hops leap out of the hop profile and smack you in the face in the best of ways. Though subtle, the coriander and orange peel round out the flavours in this delicious brew.
